usedFlag.description: indicates if session has Datacollections or XFE or EnergyScans attached

databackupFrance.description: data backup and express delivery France

databackupEurope.description: data backup and express delivery Europe

lastUpdate.description: last update timestamp: by default the end of the session, the last collect...

protectedData.description: indicates if the data are protected or not

archived.description: The data for the session is archived and no longer available on disk

deliveryAgent_flightCodeTimestamp.description: Date flight code created, if automatic

deliveryAgent_label.description: Base64 encoded pdf of airway label

closeTime.description: Time after which shipment cannot be picked up

physicalLocation.description: Where shipment can be picked up from: i.e. Stores

deliveryAgent_productcode.description: A code that identifies which shipment service was used

deliveryAgent_flightCodePersonId.description: The person who created the AWB (for auditing)

deliveryAgent_barcode.description: Courier piece barcode (not the airway bill)

requestedReturn.description: True for requesting return, False means container will be disposed

SMILES.description: the symbolic description of the structure of a chemical compound

blottingForce.description: Force used when blotting sample, Units: N?

blottingDrainTime.description: Time sample left to drain after blotting, Units: sec

subLocation.description: Indicates the samples location on a multi-sample pin, where 1 is closest to the pin base

experimentKind.description: enum(Default,MXPressE,MXPressO,MXPressE_SAD,MXScore,MXPressM,MAD,SAD,Fixed,Ligand binding,Refinement,OSC,MAD - Inverse Beam,SAD - Inverse Beam,MESH,XFE,Stepped transmission)

minDimAccrossSpindleAxis.description: minimum dimension accross the spindle axis

maxDimAccrossSpindleAxis.description: maximum dimension accross the spindle axis

presetForProposalId.description: Indicates this plan is available to all sessions on given proposal

beamLineName.description: Indicates this plan is available to all sessions on given beamline

imageDirectory.description: The directory where files reside - should end with a slash

imageContainerSubPath.description: Internal path of a HDF5 file pointing to the data for this data collection

binning.description: 1 or 2. Number of pixels to process as 1. (Use mean value.)

imageSizeX.description: Image size in x, incase crop has been used, Units: pixels

imageSizeY.description: Image size in y, Units: pixels

pixelSizeOnImage.description: Pixel size on image, calculated from magnification, duplicate? Units: um?

phasePlate.description: Whether the phase plate was used

processingCommandLine.description: Command line for running the automatic processing

importanceRank.description: For the particular autoProcProgramId and fileType, indicate the importance of the attachment. Higher numbers are more important

beamlineName.description: Beamline that this setup relates to

numberOfPixelsX.description: Detector number of pixels in x

numberOfPixelsY.description: Detector number of pixels in y

ParseError.description: When a mask can't be parsed

MaskError.description: When any error occurs on mask
